name: Slime Arena Deathmatch
description:
Pick a slime and stomp your friends in a couch multiplayer battle.

Fight in battles of up to four (4) players and hone your skills to become a champion of cuteness along a variety of wacky arenas.

__________

This game is currently being developed and you'll probably find bugs and a lot of placeholder assets.
It is playable though.
Also you'll need more than one controller.
